list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: allowing access, passage, or a view through an empty space; not closed or blocked up.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pass is kept open all year by snowplows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Pass được giữ kín suốt một năm bởi snowplows

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: exposed to the air or to view; not covered.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an open fire burned in the grate
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một ngọn lửa mở bị đốt cháy trong lưới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: with the outer edges or sides drawn away from each other; unfolded.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the trees had buds and a few open flowers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cây có chồi và một vài bông hoa mở

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a store, place of entertainment, etc.) officially admitting customers or visitors; available for business.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the store stays open until 9 p.m.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cửa hàng vẫn mở cho đến 9 giờ chiều.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: freely available or accessible; offered without restriction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the service is open to all students at the university
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dịch vụ này dành cho tất cả học sinh tại trường đại học

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person) frank and communicative; not given to deception or concealment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was quite open about my views
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã khá cởi mở về quan điểm của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a question, case, or decision) not finally settled; still admitting of debate.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: students' choice of major can be kept open until the second year
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lựa chọn lớn của học sinh có thể được mở cho đến năm thứ hai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a string) allowed to vibrate along its whole length.
(of an electrical circuit) having a break in the conducting path.
(of a vowel) produced with a relatively wide opening of the mouth and the tongue kept low.
move or adjust (a door or window) so as to leave a space allowing access and view.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she opened the door and went in
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô mở cửa và đi vào

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: unfold or be unfolded; spread out.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the eagle opened its wings and circled up into the air
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đại bàng mở cánh và khoanh tròn lên không trung

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: establish (a new business, movement, or enterprise).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they have opened a new restaurant across the street
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã mở một nhà hàng mới trên đường phố

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make or become officially ready for customers, visitors, or business.
make more available or widely known.
break the conducting path of (an electrical circuit).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the switch opens the motor circuit
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công tắc mở mạch động cơ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a championship or competition with no restrictions on who may qualify to compete.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the venue for the British Open
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: địa điểm cho người Anh mở

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an accidental break in the conducting path for an electrical current.
